description:
A technical researcher with http://anidb.net/ch132070 [Peil Technologies]. She was involved in the development of the http://anidb.net/ch124446 [Gundam Pharact]. As a survivor of the Vanadis Institute, she was once http://anidb.net/ch126961 [Prospera]`s comrade.
Source: Official page
name: Belmeria Winston
